statements: DELETE FROM StockPortfolioOptimization WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM stock_data WHERE stock_id = 1 AND volume > 100000;
DELETE FROM stock_recommendations WHERE recommendation_id = 3 AND recommendation = 'Buy' AND confidence_score > 0.8;
DELETE FROM optimization_results WHERE stock_id = 20 AND optimization_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM StockMetrics WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM PortfolioHoldings WHERE quantity <= 0 OR current_value < purchase_price * 0.8;
DELETE FROM stock_prices WHERE id = 100 AND stock_symbol = 'AAPL'
DELETE FROM portfolio_holdings WHERE stock_symbol = 'GOOGL' AND quantity > 100
